snippet: After years of fits and starts, the Vikings and Minnesota’s top political leaders unveiled a tentative agreement to build a $975 million stadium next to the aging Metrodome in Minneapolis.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Minnesota Vikings and the state's top political leaders unveil tentative agreement to build $975 million stadium next to the Metrodome in Minneapolis; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: After years of fits and starts, the Vikings and Minnesota’s top political leaders unveiled a tentative agreement to build a $975 million stadium next to the aging Metrodome in Minneapolis.

headline.seo: Vikings Reach Agreement on New Minneapolis Stadium
headline.main: Vikings Finally Have Deal on Stadium
headline.print_headline: Vikings Finally Have Deal On Stadium
